duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and promote products to build brand relationships.
Assist the management team in building store business.
Support service enhancers and utilize Concierge for strong customer relationships.
Stay updated on fashion trends and new arrivals to provide product information and create outfits for customers.
Participate in learning opportunities, accept coaching and feedback to maximize performance in sales and service metrics.
Complete operational assignments including order filling, replenishment, and recovery.
